body:
#### PR description:

Instead of testing for `isAvailable` and then running some code, one can pass the code to `and_then`. This mirrors what std::optional does in C++23.

This came out of a review for how another PR uses a Service.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1255
title: Added and_then function to Service class
